title: Discovery of chalcone-1,2,4-triazole derivatives with potent anti-tumor activity targeting Bcl-2: In vitro and in vivo evaluation.
abstract: Cancer is a major global health and economic problem, As one of the most aggressive and lethal malignancies, colon cancer ranks third worldwide in terms of both incidence and mortality. In this study, a series of new 1,2,4-triazole-chalcone derivatives were designed and synthesized, and the against HCT-116 cells (colon cancer) and A549 cells (lung cancer) proliferative activity of the target compounds was evaluated in vitro and in vivo. Among them, the representative compound 11g showed the most antitumor activity with IC
